channel.title: learning on VHDL News
channel.description: Recent content in learning on VHDL News

item.title: SusanaCanel - Proyectos VHDL
item.description: Youtube channel SusanaCanel contains 100+ videos (in spanish) about learning VHDL. The GitHub repository contains the sources used in the videos.

item.title: Learning FPGA programming, key points for a software developer
item.description: dev.to/targeted Learning FPGA programming, key points for a software developer (part 1, the time) Learning FPGA programming, key points for a software developer (part 2, registered logic) Learning FPGA programming, key points for a software developer (part 3, code patterns and inferred behavior)
